title: [Large-scale] Support Strategies for Refugee Learners in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and secondary education-level social studies knowledge
context.additional_context: Education for refugee support professionals in smartphone-based limited-technology environments, deriving field-applicable learning outcomes through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze at least three barriers to participation for refugee learners in online learning environments and propose solutions.
Learners can design microlearning content optimized for mobile device usage.
Through project-based assessment, learners can create and present a support plan for refugee learners.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
